verbs.description: [ARG0: israel] [V: hits] [ARG1: hamas targets in gaza] [ARGM-TMP: following rocket fire] israel launched raids against targets in the gaza strip on wednesday in response to rocket fire from the palestinian territory that caused damage in a southern city the israeli army said israel rockets band gaza strip abu mustafa hamas defence minister avigdor lieberman beersheba reuters rockets gaza israeli army israel defense forces
